songs: No Sunlight by Death Cab for Cutie
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
When I was young, lying in the grass
I felt so safe in a warming bath
Of sunlight
Of sunlight

[Verse 2]
Vast open sky could do no harm
Like an embrace from mother's arms
In sunlight
In sunlight

[Hook]
In sunlight
In sunlight

[Verse 3]
With every year that came to pass
More clouds appear until the sky went black
And there was
No sunlight
No sunlight
And there was
No sunlight
No sunlight anymore

[Chorus]
You disappeared at the same speed
The idealistic things I believed
The optimist died inside of me

[Hook]
No sunlight
No sunlight

No sunlight
No sunlight

[Chorus]
You disappeared at the same speed
The idealistic things I believed
The optimist died inside of me

[Hook]
No sunlight
No sunlight

No sunlight
No sunlight

[Outro]
No sunlight
No sunlight
No sunlight
No sunlight
No sunlight anymore
